entry.title: Game: NES Remix (WiiU, 2013) (7)
entry.content:
Game: NES Remix (WiiU, 2013) (7)20150103
I played for a while and beat all the Mario and Zelda levels. Once
I did that I just had two non-Remix levels that I didn't have 3
Stars on and they both sucked so bad to play---Balloon Fight and
Clu Clu Land. I tried a bunch of Remix levels and was pretty
unimpressed. I liked how the Zelda levels in Normal mode taught
you how to play though and what the secrets are.

Total time: 6:47
  • Video Games
  • NES Remix
  • WiiU
  • 2013

entry.title: Movie: The November Man, starring Pierce Brosnan (2014)
entry.content:
Movie: The November Man, starring Pierce Brosnan (2014)20150103
This was a very cool spy movie. I had guessed who Mira was pretty
early, but I actually thought I was wrong after one scene only to
have it revealed a few scenes later.
  • Movies
  • 2014

entry.title: Movie: Sex Tape, starring Cameron Diaz (2014)
entry.content:
Movie: Sex Tape, starring Cameron Diaz (2014)20150103
I watched the beginning of this movie and found it really
annoying. These movies that demonize marriage are just unrealistic
and nothing like my experience. I didn't watch the rest because it
was so dumb. The kids seemed really funny though.
  • Movies
  • 2014

entry.content:

entry.title: Downton Abbey - Episode 43 - A Moorland Holiday
entry.content:
Downton Abbey - Episode 43 - A Moorland Holiday20141230
This was an exciting episode with so much closure on so many
different plot lines. I think that we've met a new suitor for Lady
Mary. It's sad that Tom is going, but it also seems necessary to
throw some drama into the next season.
  • TV Shows
  • Downton Abbey

entry.title: Movie: The Dark Knight Rises, directed by Christopher Nolan (2012) (2)
entry.content:
Movie: The Dark Knight Rises, directed by Christopher Nolan (2012) (2)20141229
We watched this to close out the series. It's very slow paced in a
lot of different ways than the previous movies. The fights, the
plot, etc. It also feels quite disconnected from the earlier movies
in terms of people's personalities: in particular, I don't find it
believable that Batman would be cozy with Catwoman at the end. It
sucks hardcore that Bruce lost everything. Nevertheless, it was
nice finish to the trilogy.

I think it is awesome the way they set up Robin taking over for
Batman. He's disgusted at himself for accidentally killing those
guys, disgusted at the police for following stupid orders, etc.
  • Movies
  • 2012

entry.title: Movie: How to Train Your Dragon 2, starring Jay Baruchal (2014)
entry.content:
Movie: How to Train Your Dragon 2, starring Jay Baruchal (2014)20141228
We watched this as a family and all liked it. No one remembered
that Hiccup lost his leg at the end of the last one though, which
was kind of funny. I liked Gerald Butler's part in the movie.
  • Movies
  • 2014

entry.title: Movie: Frozen, starring Kristen Bell (2013) (2)
entry.content:
Movie: Frozen, starring Kristen Bell (2013) (2)20141226
I watched this with my kids with my full concentration for the
second time ever. I have, of course, listened to the songs _a lot_
and thought about it _a lot_ but this was a special occasion. It's
a very good movie.
  • Movies
  • 2013

entry.title: Movie: Batman Begins, starring Christian Bale (2005)
entry.content:
Movie: Batman Begins, starring Christian Bale (2005)20141225
We watched this with my parents and had a blast at it. I love the
moments of Bruce Wayne interacting with people who don't know how
to take him. I thought Scarecrow was an odd choice for the first
villain, but it worked.
  • Movies
  • 2005

entry.title: Game: Luftrausers (Steam, 2014)
entry.content:
Game: Luftrausers (Steam, 2014)20141224
I played this for about twenty minutes and had a good time. It's a
very strange control scheme but it didn't take THAT long to get
used to how it works. It's very fun, although like many games I
can't imagine playing it for a long time at once.

Total time: 0:19

entry.title: Game: One Finger Death Punch (Steam, 2014)
entry.content:
Game: One Finger Death Punch (Steam, 2014)20141224
I played this for a little while. The controller integration is
really bad, but the game is very clever. It is very much like an
arcade game that is very fun in small bursts.

entry.title: Game: Volgarr the Viking (Steam, 2013)
entry.content:
Game: Volgarr the Viking (Steam, 2013)20141224
I played this for a long time and got to the first boss a few
times. This game is sooo awesome and the controls are so
tight. After struggling through the first two areas many many
times, I eventually could get all the way to the boss on one
try. It was great. I'm very excited about playing this a lot.

Total time: 1:57
  • Video Games
  • Volgarr the Viking
  • Steam
  • 2013
